overview: Gay couples can love, live together, get married and apply for a mortgage but if they also share a desire to have children, 'help' will have to come from outside. Especially if they want to be the biological parents of their future offspring. Director, filmmaker and father of two daughters, Pim Mookhoek talks gay couples about parenting, and their children about life with two mothers. He also follows Len and Jermaine in their search for a suitable donor, so that their kids never have to wonder who the biological father is. They have a match with Bas and Eddy, but what now?
title: Gay Babyboom
